product.description: Trails were built to be ridden hard, that's what the Rockhopper EVO does best. With a 120mm fork, 29-inch wheels, slightly more relaxed geometry, and an e.thirteen bash guard, the EVO will tame the toughest trails.

bullets.bullet: The EVO model uses the same fully butted A1 Premium frame as other Rockhopper models, but delivers a more aggressive trail experience. The 120mm-travel RockShox fork relaxes the geometry for more stable handling, and a bash guard improves chain retention and drive train durability

RockShox XC32 features TurnKey hydraulic damping with lockout, Solo Air spring, tapered alloy steerer tube, and externally adjustable rebound for plush and lightweight trail performance with a 15mm Maxle for increased stiffness
Custom forged alloy, 10-speed XC crankset with e.thirteen Turbocharger bash guard offers lightweight and durable performance
Tektro Draco 2 hydraulic disc brakes/levers with Light Wave rotors create increased control and superior stopping power for more confident braking
SRAM X7 Type 2, 10-speed rear derailleur for reliable, high-end performance

specs.frame: FRAME Specialized A1 Premium Aluminium, Trail 29er Geometry, fully butted w/ tapered headtube, forged dropouts, replaceable alloy derailleur hanger
specs.fork: FORK RockShox XC32 29, TurnKey damping w/ lockout, Solo Air spring, tapered alloy steerer, external rebound adj., 15mm thru-axle, 32 mm stanchions, 120mm travel (S: 100mm travel)
specs.headset: HEADSET 1-1/8" upper and 1-1/2" lower threadless, Campy style, integrated full cartridge bearings
specs.stem: STEM Specialized 3D forged alloy, 4-bolt clamp, 6-degree rise, 31.8mm
specs.handlebars: HANDLEBARS Specialized mini riser, double-butted 6061 alloy, 700mm wide, 10-degree backsweep, 6-degree upsweep, 12mm rise, 31.8mm
specs.grips: GRIPS Specialized Body Geometry XC Contour, Kraton w/ gel, closed end, 132mm, lock-on
specs.front_brake: FRONT BRAKE Tektro Draco 2, hydraulic disc, dual piston, 180mm rotor
specs.rear_brake: REAR BRAKE Tektro Draco 2, hydraulic disc, dual piston, 160mm rotor
specs.brake_levers: BRAKE LEVERS Tektro Draco 2, hydraulic lever
specs.rear_derailleur: REAR DERAILLEUR SRAM X7 Type 2, 10-speed, long cage
specs.crankset: CRANKSET Custom Samox, 2pc., forged arm, 2x10 w/ e.13 Turbocharger bash guard, 170mm/175mm
specs.bottom_bracket: BOTTOM BRACKET GXP BB for 2pc., 73mm shell
specs.pedals: PEDALS Alloy, 1pc. body and cage, w/ reflectors, 9/16"
specs.rims: RIMS RH Disc 29", alloy double-wall, 26mm, pin joint, 32h
specs.front_hub: FRONT HUB Specialized disc, alloy, Hi Lo flange, sealed bearings, alloy axle, 15mm thru axle, 32h
specs.rear_hub: REAR HUB Specialized disc, alloy, Hi Lo flange, RCC ball bearing system, steel axle, steel cassette body, QR, 32h
specs.front_tire: FRONT TYRE Specialized Ground Control, 29x2.1", Kevlar bead, 60TPI
specs.rear_tire: REAR TYRE Specialized Ground Control, 29x2.1", Kevlar bead, 60TPI
specs.saddle: SADDLE Specialized Body Geometry Rockhopper, steel rails, 143mm
specs.seat_binder: SEAT BINDER Forged alloy, 31.8mm, QR, nylon washer

product.description: The Rockhopper is a time-tested trail riding hardtail built for cruising fire roads and slicing through singletrack. Equipped with Tektro 2 hydraulic disc brakes and a RockShox XC28 suspension fork featuring lockout, the Rockhopper Comp combines performance with value in a package every rider will appreciate.

bullets.bullet: Fully butted A1 Premium Aluminium 29er frame with ORE downtube for a lighter, more compliant and durable bike
RockShox XC28 fork features TurnKey hydraulic damping, lockout, alloy steerer tube, and externally adjustable rebound for plush and lightweight trail performance
Custom forged alloy, 10-speed XC crankset offers lightweight and durable performance
Tektro Draco hydraulic disc brakes/levers with Light Wave rotors create increased control and superior stopping power for more confident braking
SRAM X5 10-speed rear derailleur makes shifts super crisp and efficient

product.description: The Rockhopper is a trail-capable machine equipped with Tektro hydraulic disc brakes, 29-inch wheels, and a Shimano drivetrain, allowing you to ride deep into your favourite trails with confidence.

bullets.bullet: Fully butted A1 Premium Aluminium 29er frame with ORE downtube for a lighter, more compliant and durable bike
Smooth-travel SR Suntour XCM-LO fork with preload adjustment, hydraulic damping, lockout, and size-specific spring rates for more versatility and tunability over varying terrain
Suntour's fully replaceable ring crankset uses Shimano's Octalink-splined bottom bracket interface for reliable power transfer
Tektro hydraulic disc brakes with Light Wave rotors create increased control and superior stopping power for more confident braking
Shimano Alivio 9-speed rear derailleur and Acera Rapidfire shifters for reliable high-end performance

specs.frame: FRAME Specialized A1 Premium Aluminium, Trail 29er Geometry, fully butted w/ tapered headtube, forged dropouts, replaceable alloy derailleur hanger

specs.headset: HEADSET 1-1/8" w/ lower bearing reducer, Campy style, integrated full cartridge bearings
